type: Superalgos Review - Feature-rich platform for algorithmic trading

definition.text: Write a summary for this review page.

paragraphs.text: Superalgos requires a bit of patience and attention to gain an understanding of the fundamental concepts. Look at me, I'm still learning them! A background in programming is helpful, but not necessary to execute successful strategies.

One things that the project has going for it is a faithful and dedicated community of developers who are open to input and quick to turn ideas into reality. I reported an issue through the community discussion group, asking for advice, and within a week the issue was resolved in the next release of code!

The capabilities that this open-source project have built-in are superior to some of the paid tools I had looked into before giving SA a whirl. The framework that an open-sourced project provides really means the capabilities are somewhat limitless.
